siteMetadata.title: Token
siteMetadata.description: Participants on mainnet can now earn Joystream Tokens (JOYs).

hero.title: The JOY token
hero.text: $JOY, being Joystream’s native token, is used to govern and keep the network secured. It’s used as a currency in all dApps built on Joystream.

price.title: Price
price.tooltip: Price data will be available once the JOY token is listed on exchanges.

fdv.title: FDV
fdv.tooltip: FDV data will be available once the JOY token is listed on exchanges.

wallets.title: Where can you store JOY?
wallets.subtitle: You can keep your JOY tokens on a number of wallets that you can install as a browser extension.
wallets.info: The list of wallets is yet to grow. Check back soon for more wallets allowing for storing JOY tokens.

faucets.title: How can you get started with JOY?
faucets.subtitle: Create a free membership using one of the apps already built on the Joystream ecosystem is the easiest way to get a small number of JOY tokens to get you started.

gleev.name: Gleev
gleev.description: Gleev has its sole focus on the Web3 and Crypto content vertical, bringing together the like-minded creators and viewers around the shared passion of the present and the future of Crypto affairs.

pioneer.name: Pioneer
pioneer.description: Pioneer is the place to participate in community governance and operation. Vote on elections, submit proposals or enter a paid role to support the platform growth.

exchanges.title: Where can you buy and sell JOY?
exchanges.subtitle: If you have an appetite for more JOY tokens, check one of the exchanges listed below to buy more, or gain profit from the tokens you already have.

mexc.name: MEXC
mexc.description: MEXC is a cryptocurrency exchange based in Seychelles, founded in 2018.

bitget.name: Bitget
bitget.description: Established in 2018, Bitget is a cryptocurrency exchange headquartered in Singapore.

bitmart.name: Bitmart
bitmart.description: Bitmart is a Cayman Islands-based cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2017.

earn.title: How can you earn JOY?
earn.subtitle: There are many options to earn the JOY token. A wide variety of rewardable activities makes it easy for anyone to find a task they can enjoy. After all, it's the token's name.

videos.title: Publish videos
videos.subtitle: Partake in DAO council rewards scheme or get compensation for YT sync programme.

nfts.title: Sell your videos as NFTs
nfts.subtitle: Mint and sell NFTs on any of the available Apps via fixed price sale, timed or open auctions.

creatorTokens.title: Set up your creator token
creatorTokens.subtitle: Mint your very own tokens and sell them to your audience or put them on the market (coming soon).

gateway.title: Become a Gateway Operator
gateway.subtitle: Run your own instance of Atlas and get rewarded for new channels and content attribution.

workingGroup.title: Join a Working Group
workingGroup.subtitle: Earn stable income for doing part time work for the DAO.

validateAndStake.title: Validate and Stake
validateAndStake.subtitle: Stake your tokens on one of the trusted validators or become one yourself.

utility.title: What can you do with the JOY token?
utility.subtitle: Holding on to your JOY tokens opens up a world of exciting opportunities for engaging with the Joystream community.

workingGroup.title: Be part of a Working Group
workingGroup.subtitle: Staking some of JOY tokens opens up possibility to earn more by doing work for the DAO.

creators.title: Invest in creators
creators.subtitle: Purchase creator tokens and partake in revenue share schemes or resell on the market (coming soon).

videos.title: Publish videos
videos.subtitle: JOY tokens are required to cover transaction fees of adding records to the blockchain.

validators.title: Nominate validators
validators.subtitle: Delegate your tokens to the trusted validators and earn passive income on your JOY tokens while providing stability to the project.

elections.title: Participate in elections
elections.subtitle: Impact project governance by staking your tokens for council candidates during elections.

interact.title: Interact with others
interact.subtitle: Interactions are recoded on the blockchain and creator's reputation follows them to every app built on it.

proposals.title: Engage in proposals
proposals.subtitle: Create proposals for council to vote on and impact the future of the project directly.

supply.title: How is the JOY supply changing?
supply.subtitle: As with all other tokens, some events can increase (mint) and decrease (burn) the number of JOY tokens in the pool.

validatorsReward.title: Validators are rewarded for their work
validatorsReward.subtitle: Validators are rewarded for running nodes with the newly minted tokens.

paidOut.title: Councilors, workers and leads are paid out
paidOut.subtitle: Council elects, work groups leads and workers get paid regular salary defined by council.

publishContent.title: Creators are being rewarded for publishing high quality content
publishContent.subtitle: Council rewards scheme is in operation, rewarding best performing channels on a regular basis.

apps.title: Joystream-based applications are being recognized and rewarded
apps.subtitle: Gateway attribution rewards scheme incentives put in place for the App operators to grow the engagement.

proposalsAndBounties.title: Financing spending proposals and bounties
proposalsAndBounties.subtitle: Financing proposals to remunerate misc parts of the platform operations also result in new tokens minted.

creatorTokenSold.title: A creator token is sold
creatorTokenSold.subtitle: Platform fees apply and get burned from each sale transaction with creator tokens.

nftSold.title: An NFT is sold
nftSold.subtitle: Platform fees apply to each NFT transaction.

appFee.title: Application fee is charged
appFee.subtitle: Running your own Application comes with the fee paid to the DAO that gets burned, increasing token value.

contentPublished.title: New content is published
contentPublished.subtitle: Transaction fees taken on channels, content creation and interaction gets fully burned.

transactionFeeBurning.title: Transaction fee burning
transactionFeeBurning.subtitle: All transactions pay a fee for the block space and compute that they cost to execute, and 20% of this fee is burned.

joyPurpose.title: What is the purpose of JOY?
joyPurpose.text: JOY token is the projects main asset. It is used to transfer and exchange value from the DAO governance to the project participants and between the participants. It is used as the project currency facilitating the trades of NFTs and Creator Tokens.

whereToGet.title: Where do I get JOY tokens?
whereToGet.text: The easiest way to start is by going to the <0>Pioneer governance app</0>, creating a membership and receiving some free JOY tokens from our faucet server. Furthermore, if you're looking to expand your JOY token holdings, you now have the opportunity to purchase them on the <1>MEXC exchange</1>.

worth.title: How much is it worth?
worth.text: The token is currently listed on the <0>MEXC exchange</0> and you have the option to follow its price on that platform or on various other cryptocurrency data aggregation websites such as <1>CoinMarketCap</1> or <2>CoinGecko</2>.

cashout.title: How do I cash out JOY tokens?
cashout.text: JOY tokens can be cashed out on the <0>MEXC exchange</0>.
